001package com.technototes.library.hardware.servo;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.ElapsedTime;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.Range;
005
006// TODO: Make this use a normal Servo on not a technototes servo
007public class ServoProfiler {
008
009    private final Servo servo;
010    private double maxVel, maxAccel, targetPosition, servoRange, targetTolerance;
011    private final ElapsedTime deltaTime;
012    private double delta;
013    private double proportion;
014
015    public static class Constraints {
016
017        public double maxVelocity, maxAcceleration, proportion;
018
019        public Constraints(double vel, double accel, double prop) {
020            maxVelocity = vel;
021            maxAcceleration = accel;
022            proportion = prop;
023        }
024
025        public double getMaxVelocity() {
026            return maxVelocity;
027        }
028
029        public double getMaxAcceleration() {
030            return maxAcceleration;
031        }
032
033        public double getProportion() {
034            return proportion;
035        }
036    }
037
038    public ServoProfiler(Servo s) {
039        servo = s;
040        setServoRange(0.75);
041        setTargetTolerance(0.01);
042        deltaTime = new ElapsedTime();
043        delta = 0;
044    }
045
046    public ServoProfiler setConstraints(double vel, double accel, double prop) {
047        maxVel = vel;
048        maxAccel = accel;
049        proportion = prop;
050        return this;
051    }
052
053    public ServoProfiler setConstraints(Constraints c) {
054        return setConstraints(c.maxVelocity, c.maxAcceleration, c.proportion);
055    }
056
057    public ServoProfiler setServoRange(double rangeInRotations) {
058        servoRange = rangeInRotations;
059        return this;
060    }
061
062    public ServoProfiler setTargetPosition(double target) {
063        targetPosition = target;
064        deltaTime.reset();
065        return this;
066    }
067
068    public ServoProfiler translateTargetPosition(double translation) {
069        return setTargetPosition(Range.clip(0, targetPosition + translation, 1));
070    }
071
072    public ServoProfiler setTargetTolerance(double tolerance) {
073        targetTolerance = tolerance;
074        return this;
075    }
076
077    // fun method to update servo
078    public ServoProfiler update() {
079        // if at the target dont do anything
080        if (isAtTarget()) return this;
081        // set the past delta pos
082        double pastDelta = delta;
083        // get the change in time, then reset the timer instantly
084        double deltaSec = deltaTime.seconds();
085        deltaTime.reset();
086
087        // generate the new change in servo pos.
088        // range.clip makes the change fit the max constraints
089        // the min and max make sure both constraints are hit
090        // the deltasec makes it independent of looptime
091        delta =
092            Range.clip(
093                deltaSec * servoRange * proportion * (getTargetPosition() - getCurrentPosition()),
094                Math.max(pastDelta - maxAccel * deltaSec, -maxVel * deltaSec),
095                Math.min(pastDelta + maxAccel * deltaSec, maxVel * deltaSec)
096            );
097        servo.setPosition(getCurrentPosition() + delta / servoRange);
098
099        return this;
100    }
101
102    public boolean isAtTarget() {
103        return (Math.abs(getCurrentPosition() - getTargetPosition()) < targetTolerance);
104    }
105
106    public double getCurrentPosition() {
107        return servo.getPosition();
108    }
109
110    public Servo getServo() {
111        return servo;
112    }
113
114    public double getMaxVel() {
115        return maxVel;
116    }
117
118    public double getMaxAccel() {
119        return maxAccel;
120    }
121
122    public double getTargetPosition() {
123        return targetPosition;
124    }
125
126    public double getTargetTolerance() {
127        return targetTolerance;
128    }
129}
